t: You Can Finally Buy A Brand-New Hyundai On Amazon
s: December 10, 2024 - If you’ve been wanting to buy a new Hyundai but you haven’t wanted to deal with one of their notoriously crappy dealers, Amazon just saved you a trip. The online retail giant has finally rolled out its online car buying tool for Hyundai that has been in the works for over a year.
